mapper.select: select ho.hostNo, ho.userNo, us.name, us.hp, us.path, ho.zipcode, ho.adress1, ho.adress2, ho.adress3, ho.x, ho.y, ho.intro, ho.asking, ho.hostcost, ho.hostview from users us, host ho where hostNo = #{hostNo}
select hk.hostNo, ke.keywordName from hostkeyword hk, keyword ke where hk.keywordNo = ke.keywordNo and hk.hostNo = #{hostNo} order by ke.keywordno asc
